product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: A perennial favorite of the weekend warrior, the women's Pearl Izumi Attack bike shorts provide function and durability with features usually only found in high-end shorts. Blending nylon and spandex, SELECT Transfer fabric combines excellent stretch with cool comfort, using quick-drying yarns. Anatomic 8-panel design eliminates the inseam and potential pressure points. Pressure Relief Technology gender-specific chamois reduces pressure points via differentiated levels of padding; chamois also wicks moisture off skin. The levels of padding (total of 13mm) in the 3D Race women-specific chamois are contoured in varying densities to preclude friction points and protect key areas. Breathable 4-way stretch chamois features highly elastic open- and closed-cell padding that moves with the body for comfort. Fusion technology bonds the dual-density padding to eliminate seams and thereby increase comfort. Pearl Izumi women's Attack bike shorts feature a wide waistband that provides comfort and a solid but nonbinding fit. Silicone grippers at leg hems hold shorts in position. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays.
